text: Hey <@UJL4N3WN8>, that’s a feature I too really want to see, unfortunately I don’t have an update on the timeline for that, but I will give the team a nudge.
Reminder: Please keep conversations related to announcements in threads and keep conversations unrelated to the announcements in other channels. This makes it so folks can easily find news.

Reminder: There are lots of great ways to stay connected with what’s happening in HubSpot development. To be made aware of any changes that affect developers we recommend <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog|subscribing to our developer changelog>. We post announcements about new developer facing functionality as well as communicate from there if we need to make <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/breaking-change-definition|breaking changes>.

Actually <@UJL4N3WN8> I have this update to point you to:
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CJ5DN6RKP/p1677009597147659?thread_ts=1677004429.547609&cid=CJ5DN6RKP>
